prompt.name: Navigate to HTML Tutorial
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.w3schools.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the HTML tutorial page from the main page.

input.action: 'Scroll down to the `HTML` section', 'Click on the `Learn HTML` button'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the HTML tutorial page.

prompt.name: Navigate to CSS Tutorial
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.w3schools.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the CSS tutorial page from the main page.

input.action: 'Scroll down to the `CSS` section','Click on the `Learn CSS` button'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the CSS tutorial page.

prompt.name: Use the Search Bar
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.w3schools.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User searches for 'python' using the search bar.

input.action: 'Type `python` into the main navigation search bar', 'Click on the search icon'

expected.outcome: The user is shown search results for 'python'.

prompt.name: Navigate to Exercises
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.w3schools.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the exercises menu from the main navigation.

input.action: 'Click on the `Exercises` button in the main navigation'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the exercises menu.

prompt.name: Navigate to Certificates

prompt.name: Navigate to Color Picker
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.w3schools.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the color picker tool.

input.action: 'Click on the `Services` button in the main navigation', 'Scroll down to the `Color Picker` option', 'Click on the `Color Picker` link'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the color picker page.

prompt.name: Navigate to How To Section
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.w3schools.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the 'How To' section.

input.action: 'Scroll down to the `How To Section` section', 'Click on the `Learn How To` button under the `How To Section` section'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the 'How To' section.

prompt.name: View Web Templates
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.w3schools.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the web templates page.

input.action: 'Scroll down to the `Web Templates` section', 'Click on the `Browse Templates` button'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the web templates page.

prompt.name: Test Typing Speed
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.w3schools.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the typing speed test.

input.action: 'Click on the `Services` button in the main navigation', 'Scroll down to the `Typing Speed` option', 'Click on the `Typing Speed` link'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the typing speed test page.

prompt.name: Navigate to the About Page

prompt.description: User navigates to the about page from the footer.

input.action: 'Scroll to the bottom of the page', 'Click on the `ABOUT` link in the footer'

prompt.description: User navigates to the code game.

input.action: 'Scroll down to the `Code Game` section', 'Click on the `Play Game` button'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the code game page.

prompt.name: Navigate to the Spaces page
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.w3schools.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the Spaces page from the main page.

input.action: 'Click on the `Spaces` button in the main navigation'

prompt.name: Navigate to the `Learn Rust` page

prompt.description: User navigates to the `Learn Rust` page from the main page.

input.action: 'Scroll down to the `Rust` button', 'Click on the `Rust` button'

prompt.name: Navigate to the `Learn Git` page

prompt.description: User navigates to the `Learn Git` page from the main page.

input.action: 'Scroll down to the `Git` button', 'Click on the `Git` button'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the `Learn Git` page.

prompt.name: HTML Tryit Editor
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.w3schools.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User opens the HTML Tryit Editor, modifies the code, and runs it.

input.action: 'Scroll down to the `HTML` section', 'Click on the `Learn HTML` button', 'Click on the `Try it Yourself` button', 'In the code editor, change the text inside the <h1> tag to `My First Heading`', 'Click the `Run` button'

expected.outcome: The output on the right side of the screen should display 'My First Heading'.

prompt.name: CSS Tryit Editor
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.w3schools.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User opens the CSS Tryit Editor, modifies the style, and runs it.

input.action: 'Scroll down to the `CSS` section', 'Click on the `Learn CSS` button', 'Click on the `Try it Yourself` button', 'In the code editor, change the `background-color` to `powderblue`', 'Click the `Run` button'

expected.outcome: The background color of the output on the right side of the screen should change to powderblue.

prompt.name: Take a Quiz
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.w3schools.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User starts the HTML quiz and answers the first question.

input.action: 'Scroll down to the `HTML` section', 'Click on the `Learn HTML` button', 'Scroll down to the `HTML Quiz Test` section',  'Click on the `Start HTML Quiz!` button', 'Click on the `Start the HTML Quiz` button', 'Select an answer for the first question', 'Click on the `Next` button'

expected.outcome: The user should be taken to the second question of the HTML quiz.

prompt.name: Use the Color Picker to select a color
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.w3schools.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User uses the color picker to select a color and see its values.

input.action: 'Click on the `Services` button in the main navigation', 'Scroll down to the `Color Picker` option', 'Click on the `Color Picker` link', 'Click on a color in the color wheel', 'Observe the HEX, RGB, and HSL values'

expected.outcome: The HEX, RGB, and HSL value fields should update to reflect the selected color.

prompt.name: Navigate through tutorials
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.w3schools.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates from the homepage to a specific sub-topic in the Python tutorial.

input.action: 'Scroll down to the `Python` section', 'Click on the `Learn Python` button', 'In the left-side navigation, click on `Python Dictionaries`', 'Click on `Add Items` in the sub-menu under `Python Dictionaries`', 'Click the `Next` button'

expected.outcome: The user should be on the 'Python - Remove Dictionary Items' page of the tutorial.

prompt.name: Explore 'How To' Snippets
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.w3schools.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User explores the 'How To' section and tries a code snippet.

input.action: 'Scroll down to the `How To Section` section', 'Click on the `Learn How To` button under the `How To Section` section', 'Click on `Menu Icon` in the left-side navigation', 'Click on the `Try it Yourself` button for the first example', 'Click the `Run` button'

expected.outcome: The user should see an interactive example of a menu icon.

prompt.name: Use Frontend Code Editor
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.w3schools.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User opens and uses the frontend code editor.

input.action:
'Scroll down to the `Code Editor` section', 'Click on the `Try Frontend Editor (HTML/CSS/JS)` button', 'In the code editor, change the text inside the

tag to `My First Paragraph`, 'Click the `Run` button'

expected.outcome: The output pane should render the new paragraph with the specified style.

prompt.name: Use Backend Code Editor
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.w3schools.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User opens and uses the backend code editor.

input.action: 'Click on the `Try Backend Editor (Python/PHP/Java/C..)` button', 'Select `Python` from the language dropdown', 'In the editor, modify the parameters of the `print` function', 'Click the `Run` button'

expected.outcome: The output pane should show the result of the executed Python code.

prompt.name: Find and use a website template
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.w3schools.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User finds a website template and opens it in the editor.

input.action: 'Scroll down to the `Web Templates` section', 'Click on the `Browse Templates` button', 'Scroll down to the `Black & White Photo Template` section', 'Click on the `Try it Yourself` button in the `Black & White Photo Template` section'

expected.outcome: The selected website template should open in the Tryit Editor.

prompt.name: Check Browser Statistics
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.w3schools.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the Browser Statistics page to view browser usage trends.

input.action: 'Click on the `Services` button in the main navigation', 'Scroll down to the `Browser Statistics` option','Click on `Browser Statistics`', 'Review the browser usage charts'

expected.outcome: The user is on the Browser Statistics page and can see charts for browser usage.
